Overview

Overview

How to use these pages

RBG-Maxwell is currently under inner test. The code will be given under request Jun-Jie Zhang (zjacob@mail.ustc.edu.cn) or Ming-Yan Sun (sunmingyan0301@163.com) If you use our program, we have provided two places to cite in Acknowledging. Details of the various functions in the program are provided in General Structure. Finally, you can find out how to use each module in Example, which will help you to get a better understanding of RGB-Maxwell.
